title: Applied Nutrition 14-Day Fat Burn Cleanse Dietary Supplement Tablets - 56 CT
cleaned_text: Applied Nutrition 14-Day Fat Burn Cleanse Dietary Supplement Tablets - 56 CT On This Page Directions Directions: (adult) take two (2) tablets in the morning prior to breakfast and two (2) tablets in the afternoon. Drink at least 8 oz (a full glass) of water with each two tablets. Do not exceed four (4) tablets per day. Drink 8-10 glasses of water per day. If caffeine keeps you up at night, do not take this product in the evening as it contains natural caffeine. Notice: for best results we recommend limiting the consumption of additional caffeine while using this product (e.g. maximum three 8 ounce cups of coffee per day). DescriptionApplied Nutrition® 14-Day Fat Burn Cleanse* Dietary Supplement Tablets. Powerful fat burning & gentle cleansing! Powerful calorie burning with green tea extract*. Boost metabolism & burn fat with concentrated green tea extract*. Powerful antioxidant protection*. Effective internal cleanse to feel lighter & more energized*. 56. Other Description14-Day Fat Burn Cleanse. Thermogenic power combined, with easy cleansing*. Thermogenic component and antioxidant blend: This botanical blend supplies powerful antioxidants to support cellular health, plus important trace minerals to support healthy metabolism.* Easy cleanse and detox blend: This proprietary blend supplies botanicals that are traditionally used in digestive health formulas.* Feel renewed in only 14 days*. Fee energized*. Boost your metabolism*. Cleanse your body*. The boost you need to jump-start your weight loss plan!* If losing weight was easy, we'd all be slim and trim. It takes real commitment to make the diet and lifestyle changes that result in genuine weight loss. And it's easy to get discouraged if you don't see results right away. 14-day fat Burn Cleanse is specially designed to increase calorie burning and sweep waste and toxins from the digestive tract.* The result is the boost you need to help you lose weight, giving you the encouragement you need to keep it up - and keep it off.* Increase your results!* Applied Nutrition® is committed to developing science-based products that exceed the highest standards for quality and purity. As a leader in innovation, we continuously strive to bring forth new ideas and groundbreaking formulas that enhance health and well-being. To learn more about our products, please visit us online at: www.appliednutrition.com. This product has been formulated to deliver a highly concentrated form of green tea extract combined with caffeine that, while not literally "melting" fat off the body, has been shown to increase calorie burning and fat burning ability.* When used in conjunction with a reduced calorie diet and exercise¥, this product can help you achieve your weight loss goals.* Distributed, formulated and quality tested by: Applied Nutrition®. Questions: contact consumer affairs [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection). ¥Diet & exercise plan available online at www.appliednutrition.com/deplan. To join our wellness club and receive tips on how to improve your health, please visit us at: www.appliednutrition.com/wellness1. Nutrition Facts Serving Size: 2.0 tablets Servings 28 IngredientsOther Ingredients: Dicalcium Gum Arabic. WarningsContains: fish (anchovy, sardine), crustacean shellfish (lobster, crab, shrimp). Usage warnings: do not use if safety seal is broken. This product contains caffeine and may affect blood pressure and/or heart conditions. Check with your doctor before using this product if you are using medication or have any medical conditions, including heart disease and/or high blood pressure. Taking this product without adequate water may cause choking. Do not use if you are pregnant or nursing. Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Not intended for use by persons under 18. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Warning: (State of California prop 65) this product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. DistributorApplied Nutrition P.O. Box
